LanguageData.DMSRC_AncientBroadcaster.label: ancient broadcaster
LanguageData.DMSRC_AncientBroadcaster.description: A high-power communication relay to be used in the colony for emergency reinforcements. The identification code of this rescue protocol has long been abandoned, so only those mechanized units that are feral will take the bait.
LanguageData.DMSRC_ContainerTransponder.label: cargo transponder
LanguageData.DMSRC_ContainerTransponder.description: A transponder that designated location of security container even over a great distance.
LanguageData.DMSRC_ContainerTransponder.comps.CompIns: Can be decrypted at a research bench. Select a colonist and right-click this to decrypt it.
LanguageData.DMSRC_TimedBomb.label: timed bomb
LanguageData.DMSRC_TimedBomb.description:
An explosive device with adjustable timer. Causes destruction of anything in a small area if damaged or timer runs out.
Can be hacked to prevent detonation.
